ValidationRule.description: Date cannot be entered in Freeze Removed and ppwk sent to Alt. Payee when any on the following fields are blank: Kit Received, Court Document Received, Edit Complete-Authorization Sent to Clt, Authorization Recd-Sent to CAM or Split of Assets Complete
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISBLANK( X401_k_PEP__c ) && RecordType.Name = 'QDRO' && NOT(ISBLANK( Freeze_Removed_ppwk_Sent_to_Alt_Payee__c)) && (ISBLANK(Kit_Received__c) || ISBLANK(Court_Document_Received__c) || ISNULL(Edit_Complete_Authorization_Sent_to_Clt__c) || ISBLANK(Authorization_Sent_to_CAM__c) || ISBLANK(Split_of_Assets_Complete__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Date cannot be entered in Freeze Removed and ppwk sent to Alt. Payee when any on the following fields are blank: Kit Received, Court Document Received, Edit Complete-Authorization Sent to Clt, Authorization Recd-Sent to CAM or Split of Assets Complete
